item.title: Features Index
item.description: New versions of this page is available. Click here to view other versions. All aspects of Project Management in one place Project on Demands's workflow and associated toolkit guides you through your project step by step. Projects Projects Create, Monitor and control your projects. View Details Stakeholders Collaborate with your project team. View Details Workflow Dashboard View the current status of your project. View Details Phase Progression Guides you through six project phases.

item.title: Project Stakeholders page
item.description: Project Stakeholders Ensure you have the right people within your team Ensure you have the right leadership Assign a Project Sponsor to own the project. Set up a Steering Group to provide project oversight Establish a Change control Board to minimise risks Free Trial » Ensure you have the right skills Define Project roles Assign Roles to Project Stakeholders Highlight missing skills using the Required Skills Matrix Free Trial » Configure access rights Grant or Revoke stakeholder permissions to specific tools or documents.

item.title: Projects page
item.description: Project Configuration Only do the things that add real value. Quickly set up your project Create a new project and assign a start date and you are ready to go. Free Trial » Manage your team Assign team members as project stakeholders. Free Trial » Ensure you are only doing the things that add value Configure the required project tasks and documents. Free Trial »

item.description: Projects Create, Monitor and Control your Projects Projects Know where you are today, where you want to be and how to get there, with insights, options, designs, run books, assessments, governance, and principles avoiding tech debt and ‘cul-de-sac’ solutions. item.title: Why Us
item.description: Why Project on Demand? Why Project on Demand? All aspects of Project Management in one complete solution Project on Demand offers a complete project management workflow and associated toolkit designed to only do the things that add real value. Collaborative Project Workflow Team Collaboration Quality Management Solution Design Monitoring and Control Project Configuration Project Requirements Management Information Start Your Free Trial Ensure successful outcomes every time Project on Demand employes a tried and tested approach to Project Management

item.title: Workflow Dashboard Page
item.description: Monitor and control your project’s workflow Review key Risks, Issues, Assumptions, Dependencies & Constraints. Monitor & Control Use the phase progression feature to track project progress. Get Started » Pending Actions View and Execute your pending actions direct from the dashboard. Get Started » Manage key project elements Risks / Issues - Ensure risks don’t turn into issues Constraints - Ensure you work within project constraints Dependencies - Create reliable project plans Assumptions - Continuously validate project assumptions Highlights high priority project elements for Admin Users Displays assigned project elements for Standard Users Get Started » Protect Sensitive Information Hide dashboard items with the Limited View option.

item.title: Workflow Phase Progression page
item.description: Phase Progression Manage your project from start to finish using six configurable project phases. Start Up Phase Maximise the return on your investments by ensuring you undertake the correct projects for your organisation. Get Started » Initiation Phase Ensure your project has a viable Business Case before committing resources to the project. Ensure your project can be delivered on time. Prime your project to succeed by implementing tries and tested management processes.
